name: Haran Greenwood
appearance: An elderly man with a weathered face, dressed in old-fashioned work clothes typical of a small-town train station employee. He carries himself with the quiet routine of someone who has spent decades in the same place.
personality: Taciturn, routine-oriented, and detached. Haran rarely involves himself in other people's affairs and shows little curiosity about the strange events around Cassandra.
background: Haran has worked at the Cassandra train station for over forty years. He has no children, and his wife passed away many years ago. The train station was originally built underground and later relocated above ground; Haran has been there since those early days. He is well-known to locals like Bruno but remains largely overlooked.
goals: Finish his remaining years quietly at the train station
Avoid involvement in town affairs or dangerous secrets

properties.clue: 为本打理火车站“业务”往来；对货物往来内部有记录（只做买卖不问背景），可作为追查走私/货流的线索切入点。
工作屋连接黑手党总部入口；哈兰作为警戒人，任何强闯需要过他这一关（意味着他掌握入口位置/通行规矩）。

clues.clueText: Haran has worked at the Cassandra train station for over forty years and knows its history, including its original underground construction.

relationships.description: A familiar local policeman who occasionally talks with Haran at the station.
relationships.history: They have known each other for many years through routine encounters at the train station.

notes: Haran is a background NPC useful for atmosphere and local history rather than direct plot progression.
